name: Internal Game jam
description:
This game was developed in a week for an internal game jam at NUA. We struggled to get the initial idea working and so turned to a new approach. The assets were created over a few days and the game was put together in around 24 hours!

You play as a janitor in an overworked, underfunded hospital where you must perform both your jobs and the doctors jobs.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Space - Pick up items from cupboards/Give items to patients

Game can be run by extracting the file and running the .exe within!
